resources.string: This application needs access to the camera for expression recognition. Please grant the permission to continue.
Why We Need Access to Camera?

This application requires access to your camera to perform expression recognition. This feature allows the app to analyze your facial expressions in real-time, providing personalized feedback and enhancing your overall experience. Your privacy is of utmost importance to us, and we assure you that all data captured by the camera is used securely and solely for the purpose of expression recognition. We do not store, share, or transmit any images or videos to third parties. Please grant the permission to continue using this feature.
